title: Euromoney Magazine Names Citi Best Private Bank for Corporate Executives in Latin America
summary: Miami, Florida - Citi was recognized by Euromoney magazine as the Best Private Bank for Corporate Executives in Latin America as part of the magazine's Private Banking Survey 2014. The prestigious awards were presented to Citi during an exclusive ceremony that took place February 13 in London.
tag-1: Euromoney Magazine Names Citi Best Private Bank for Corporate Executives in Latin America
tag-3: Miami, Florida – Citi was recognized by Euromoney magazine as the Best Private Bank for Corporate Executives in Latin America as part of the magazine's Private Banking Survey 2014. The prestigious awards were presented to Citi during an exclusive ceremony that took place February 13 in London.
tag-4: Citi was also recognized by the magazine as the Best Private Bank in Ecuador and Mexico. In addition, Citi received three awards in Uruguay – "Best Range of Investment Products," "Best Net-Worth-Specific Services Super Affluent," and "Best Corporate Advisory for Private Banking Clients." Furthermore, the bank was recognized as "Best Net-Worth-Specific Services High Net Worth I" in Colombia and Mexico and "Best Net-Worth-Specific Services Super Affluent" in Peru.
tag-5: "We are committed to continue offering all the high quality financial services the bank provides that generate the best outcomes for our clients. Euromoney's continuous recognitions distinguish our efforts of tirelessly serving our private banking clients in the LatAm region. Our team continues to deepen our client relationships and will do so for many more years," stated Alexander G. van Tienhoven, CEO, Citi Wealth and Investment Management, Latin America and Mexico
tag-6: Euromoney has been awarding the Private Banking Awards since 2004, and it is considered one of the most respected awards in the banking industry. Awards are based on the annual Euromoney Private Banking Survey, which provides a qualitative and quantitative review of the best services in private banking, by region and by areas of services. Factors such as assets under management, profitability, ratio of clients to relationship managers, and services offered, among other things, are all considered in developing the ranking of top private banks.
tag-7: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
